ovdesc.p: This is used to set the parameter for the SWIFT.
This parameter table will be used to define generic rules for SWIFT that may be used across many messages.
The Current SWIFT Release and the Previous SWIFT release fields are used to enable the activation of the new SWIFT functionality.
The fields Restricted Currency and Message type are used to restrict currencies for specific message types

desc.p: This field will be used to hold the current SWIFT release.
Should hold a value within range 1950 - 2049.
This is a multi-value field to hold the previous SWIFT release History.
When future SWIFT changes are released the field PREV.SWIFT.REL will be updated with the value from CURR.SWIFT.REL.
Multi-value field used to define the Currency where SWIFT has restricted the use of it in certain message types.
Should be a valid record in CURRENCY table.
Associated sub-value field to the RESTRICTED.CCY field, to hold the Message Type.
This field is used to define the message types that the currency defined in field Restricted CCY is not allowed.
Should be a valid message type in DE.FORMAT.SWIFT
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
